newtab_introduction_title.message: Welcome to FVD Speed Dial Quick Tour!

newtab_introduction_slide1_title.message: Choose 3D or Regular Speed Dial Style

newtab_introduction_slide1_text.message: You can switch look any time by Right Click > Style or Options > Appearance > Style.

newtab_introduction_slide2_text.message:
Click on Left or Bottom panels to activate Apps or Widgets sidebars.

Hint: Use Spacebar button on keyboard to Show/Hide Widgets

newtab_introduction_slide3_text.message: You only need to select this once and we will save your preference

newtab_introduction_slide_configure_text.message: Please note, you can configure all these options later in the FVD Speed Dial settings.

User Data Policy:

This extension takes over your new tab and changes your search inside SpeedDial to Microsoft Bing.

This extension may use History to create Bookmark tiles (Speed Dial) for you. The extension sends requests to the server to synchronize your bookmark tiles (speed dials) and other settings. You can disable Synchronization and Speed Dial here or in the extension settings.

This extension has built-in monetization (ads) to support our development of all features and needs to use user data permission: the search features within the extension will be provided by Microsoft Bing or Yahoo, sponsored bookmark tiles (for example Amazon link or other similar affiliate ids), and Premium account with extra features for you. You can disable all of them in the settings.

bg_dialog_adddial_pick_local_file_desc.message:
To link dial to you local file you need to write correct file location in format:
{examples}
Alternative way how to get file address: open new tab. drag and drop file into your browser. In URL bar you will see the address of your files.

bg_dialog_adddial_pick_local_file_desc_w.message:
file:///{full path to file where \ replaced by /}
For example: file:///C:\user\pic.jpg

options_show_icons_and_titles_above_dial.message: Show icons and titles above dials

options_show_in_context_menu.message: Show in context menu ( Right Click )

options_donate_message.message:
Thank you for your interest in donating! Your donation will help ensure that we can continue to make great software, and keep as much of it free as possible. How’s it free if we’re asking you to donate? That’s the great part—if you can’t afford it or you’re not sure it’s worth it, you’re welcome to keep using our software free of charge. 

Building, improving and extending our FVD Speed dial Addon do cost a lot of money.

We truly hope that satisfied users or users who like our initiative are willing to donate some money (of they can afford it) enabling us to reach as many people as possible in the entire world.

Received donations will NOT be used to pay salaries or any indirect costs that is not directly related to keeping the service on the Internet.

options_sync_need_install.message: In order to use Sync you need to install EverSync extension

options_sync_need_install_desc.message: To you synchronization you need to install additional addon - EverSync extension:

options_sync_need_install_ability_6.message: Sync your Firefox, Chrome, Opera, Mobile Phones Bookmarks

options_sync_need_install_ability_8.message: Copy Bookmarks to FVD Speed Dial and From Speed Dial to Bookmarks

options_sync_need_install_ability_9.message: Trash / Favorites / Private / Archive / Advanced Search and more additional features.

options_sync_need_install_ability_4.message: Use it between Firefox, Chrome, Opera, Mobile Phones, Different PCs.

options_sync_need_install_ability_5.message: More features are coming (Sync Bookmarks, History, Notes).

options_sync_warning_line_1.message: Sync addon requires permission which is called "Access to all data on computer"

options_sync_warning_line_2.message: It doesn't mean that our addon will access to all your files!

options_sync_warning_line_3.message: We need access only to one bookmark file in Chrome environment.

options_sync_warning_line_4.message: As soon as you get permission to overwrite file(s), Chrome calls it "Full access".

options_sync_warning_line_5.message: Please, do not get paranoid with that! Chrome Webstore manually reviews such addons!!!

Important!
If in the new version you can't backup or restore your dials, contact us team@nimbusweb.co

broken_incognito_title.message: New Legacy Extensions Will NOT work in Private Mode

broken_incognito_text.message:
Hi Speed Dial User,
If you read this message, it means that you're using FVD Speed Dial in Private Mode. If not, please contact us team@nimbusweb.co

FireFox requires migrating all extensions to New Web Extensions technology, we need to make our extension compatible otherwise it will be automatically disabled.
Unfortunately, FVD Speed Dial won't work in Private Mode for now and there is not much we can do. We hope FF team will provide such functionality in the next updates.

But You still can use FVD Speed Dial in Normal Mode.

Thank you
Nimbus Team.

broken_nohistory_title.message: You need to update Firefox Settings

broken_nohistory_text.message:
Hi Speed Dial User,

This message from FVD Speed Dial team.

FireFox requires migrating all extensions to New Web Extensions technology, we need to make our extension compatible otherwise it will be automatically disabled.

You've selected "Never Remember History" option. You need to add FVD Speed Dial to the exceptions otherwise it won't work.
Please follow link below, to read quick guide. That's pretty simple and one-time change. If you didn't enable "Never Remember History" or added FVD Speed Dial to the exceptions but still see this message, please contact us team@nimbusweb.co

options_show_popup.message: Show small window when Click on Icon

newtab_introduction_slide_es_text.message:
Enjoy access to your favorite sites, bookmarks, and tabs from any computer. Don't lose your bookmarks and settings.

This extension takes over your new tab and changes your search bar inside FVD Speed Dial to Microsoft Bing.
